maqras.text: Hadhani Khasmani Akhtasamu Fi Rabbihim Fa-Al-Ladhina Kafaru Qutti`at Lahum Thiyabun Min Narin Yusabbu Min Fawqi Ru'usihimu Al-Hamimu
Yusharu Bihi Ma Fi Butunihim Wa Al-Juludu
Kullama 'Aradu 'An Yakhruju Minha Min Ghammin 'U`idu Fiha Wa Dhuqu `Adhaba Al-Hariqi
Inna Allaha Yudkhilu Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Jannatin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Yuhallawna Fiha Min 'Asawira Min Dhahabin Wa Lu'ulu'uaan Wa Libasuhum Fiha Harirun
Wa Hudu 'Ila At-Tayyibi Mina Al-Qawli Wa Hudu 'Ila Sirati Al-Hamidi

Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Wa Yasudduna `An Sabili Allahi Wa Al-Masjidi Al-Harami Al-Ladhi Ja`alnahu Lilnnasi Sawa'an Al-`Akifu Fihi Wa Al-Badi Wa Man Yurid Fihi Bi'ilhadin Bizulmin Nudhiqhu Min `Adhabin 'Alimin
Wa 'Idh Bawwa'na Li'ibrahima Makana Al-Bayti 'An La Tushrik Bi Shay'aan Wa Tahhir Baytiya Liltta'ifina Wa Al-Qa'imina Wa Ar-Rukka`i As-Sujudi
Wa 'Adhin Fi An-Nasi Bil-Hajji Ya'tuka Rijalaan Wa `Ala Kulli Đamirin Ya'tina Min Kulli Fajjin `Amiqin
Liyash/hadu Manafi`a Lahum Wa Yadhkuru Asma Allahi Fi 'Ayyamin Ma`lumatin `Ala Ma Razaqahum Min Bahimati Al-'An`am Fakulu Minha Wa 'At`imu Al-Ba'isa Al-Faqira
Thumma Liyaqđu Tafathahum Wa Liufu Nudhurahum Wa Liattawwafu Bil-Bayti Al-`Atiqi
Dhalika Wa Man Yu`azzim Hurumati Allahi Fahuwa Khayrun Lahu `Inda Rabbihi Wa 'Uhillat Lakumu Al-'An`am 'Illa Ma Yutla `Alaykum Fajtanibu Ar-Rijsa Mina Al-'Awthani Wa Ajtanibu Qawla Az-Zuri
Hunafa'a Lillahi Ghayra Mushrikina Bihi Wa Man Yushrik Billahi Faka'annama Kharra Mina As-Sama'i Fatakhtafuhu At-Tayru 'Aw Tahwi Bihi Ar-Rihu Fi Makanin Sahiqin
Dhalika Wa Man Yu`azzim Sha`a'ira Allahi Fa'innaha Min Taqwa Al-Qulubi
Lakum Fiha Manafi`u 'Ila 'Ajalin Musammaan Thumma Mahilluha 'Ila Al-Bayti Al-`Atiqi
Wa Likulli 'Ummatin Ja`alna Mansakaan Liyadhkuru Asma Allahi `Ala Ma Razaqahum Min Bahimati Al-'An`ami Fa'ilahukum 'Ilahun Wahidun Falahu 'Aslimu Wa Bashiri Al-Mukhbitina
Al-Ladhina 'Idha Dhukira Allahu Wajilat Qulubuhum Wa As-Sabirina `Ala Ma 'Asabahum Wa Al-Muqimi As-Salaati Wa Mimma Razaqnahum Yunfiquna

Wa Al-Budna Ja`alnaha Lakum Min Sha`a'iri Allahi Lakum Fiha Khayrun Fadhkuru Asma Allahi `Alayha Sawaffa Fa'idha Wajabat Junubuha Fakulu Minha Wa 'At`imu Al-Qani`a Wa Al-Mu`tarra Kadhalika Sakhkharnaha Lakum La`allakum Tashkuruna
Lan Yanala Allaha Luhumuha Wa La Dima'uuha Wa Lakin Yanaluhu At-Taqwa Minkum Kadhalika Sakhkharaha Lakum Litukabbiru Allaha `Ala Ma Hadakum Wa Bashiri Al-Muhsinina
